metadata.title: CVE-2023-39742 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
giflib v5.2.1 was discovered to contain a segmentation fault via thecomponent getarg.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-39742` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

giflib-tools - 5.1.9-1ubuntu0.1
libgif7 - 5.1.9-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: giflib package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.1.9-1ubuntu0.1').
